replies.msg:
華記同TVB一樣一日唔停播只會害更多人

所以大家幫得就幫，先去新加坡警察投訴網篤佢灰，跟手用殘體字向領事強力要求釋放佢

範本如下：
1.

https://www.police.gov.sg/iwitness

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to provide evidence to support an ongoing investigation of a crime that was suspected to be committed inside Singapore by a Hong Kong resident Mr. Yeung(楊官華).

Contrary to what Mr. Yeung's self explanation that he is not planning to carry out any public assembly in Singapore to publicly discuss politics regarding PRC and Hong Kong SAR, there is clear evidences on the internet that shows his intention to spread his political view in Singapore(Links attached below).


As an active internet users, I have strong reasons to believe his sole purpose for travelling to Singapore is to attend this meeting , as he has a very strong political view on China and Hong Kong politics according to both his youtube channel(Links attached below) which is also a clear evidence against his claim of not being involved in political discussions. A majority of his subscribers are also very political active.

I think it is only fair and justice that the investigation of his case to not be misleaded and to have proper and sufficient evidence for the truth to be revealed.


attachment 1:
An invitation created by him prior to the event for the crime.


https://upload.cc/i1/2019/11/05/vs8Yk6.png

attachement 2:

A channel in youtube where majority of the video episodes are about political view.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjQiROcVtb0ZqPpA-xE2flA


attachment 3:
a recording of the event

https://youtu.be/Gh-UZgpJ040




Thank you for your kind attention.

(your name here)


2.
singcg_hkg@mfa.sg

领事先生：

于网上媒体得悉 贵国政府无理扣押我国公民 杨官华先生，身为一位中国人，本人感到极度愤怒。 据悉 杨先生于 贵国餐厅与中国人商议国事，即被 贵国拘捕。此等卑鄙可耻行为乃属粗暴干涉我国内政。身为中国人，怀有中国心乃天经地义，在外国议论内政是合情合理。因此，即使干犯 贵国法律亦属合理。在外，我以中国人的身份，呼吁 贵国政府停止追究 杨官华先生的一切行为。 要知道我国现正是亚洲第一大国，世界首屈一指之强国，新加坡政府要扣押我国公民实属螳臂挡车，以卵击石。凡犯我中华者，虽远必诛。若 贵国政府一意孤行，广大中国人民必令 贵国付出代价。一切后果，贵国政府自负。
敬祝台安
一位爱国中国人
